about_the_game:
A Strategic Game and a Revolutionary Saga

Str!ve is a captivating turn-based combat game that combines strategy with immersive storytelling. Immerse yourself in a beautifully hand-drawn world, animated frame by frame with meticulous attention to detail, and explore a rich narrative where you will work to foment a revolution against an oppressive dictator.

A Small Country, A Grand Revolt

At the heart of a country besieged by warlike nations, a dictator has seized power, plunging its citizens into misery. Follow Morgane, the rebellious witch, Feuille, the spirit of nature, and Milton, the determined thief, in their shared quest to overthrow the tyrant. Unite their forces, each character carrying their unique motivations.

Drawn and Animated with Heart

Str!ve offers an exceptional visual experience with characters animated frame by frame and hand-painted backgrounds. Breathtaking environments, from sunny beaches to lush forests, provide total immersion in this 2D animated world with 3D effects that add beautiful depth.

Build Your Destiny

Str!ve's unique gameplay relies on assembling action bricks to form attacks, defense, and healing. Play four bricks of the same color to trigger additional elemental attacks. Tactical choices influence the outcome of battles. Explore interactive maps, uniting your heroes' forces to overcome obstacles.

Refine Your Strategy

After each won battle, choose to enhance, earn, or remove power bricks from your deck, creating devastating combos. Develop synergies between your heroes to influence the final combat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 SP1
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10-compatible graphics card with at least 1GB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
